title: Interpretation of a dream about petting an aunt in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about playing the role of an aunt in a dream. You are asking about the interpretation of a dream about playing the role of an aunt in a dream. In the following lines we know what scholars and translators have reported and not personal interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about playing the role of an aunt in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about playing the role of an aunt in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. However, Seeing caressing can be a sign of intense love, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself caressing his wife in a dream, this may be a sign of his love for her, and God knows the unseen. Seeing caressing his wife can also express her happy life, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about marrying an old man in Dream Interpretation of a dream about marrying an old man in a dream could be a sign of the ability to get rid of problems, God willing. When you see an unmarried young man marrying an old woman in a dream, this could be evidence of the ability to overcome problems, and God knows best, as it may indicate achieving goals, and God knows best. I know when you see intercourse with an old woman in a dream, it can be a sign of achieving goals, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a girl’s wedding in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a young girl in a dream can indicate fatigue, and God knows the unseen. In case the dreamer sees the marriage of a young woman, it can lead to evil, and God knows The highest and most knowledgeable is when you see a married man marrying a young woman in a dream, this may be a sign of committing sins and disobedience, and God knows the unseen. Whereas if the dreamer sees the wedding of a young woman he knows, it may represent her assuming responsibility, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about someone flirting with my wife in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about someone flirting with my wife in a dream did not We find specific interpretations to see that. However, seeing flirting in a dream can be a sign that desires will be fulfilled and that God is Greatest and Most Knowing. If the dreamer sees flirting, it may lead to achieving difficult goals, and God knows best. When you see turning around, it may indicate goodness, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of dreams for someone putting his hand on My waist in a dream: Interpretation of dreams about someone putting his hand on my waist in a dream. Placing a hand on a woman’s waist in lust can indicate bad dreams, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Whereas if a married woman sees a familiar man placing his hand on her waist, this may indicate exposure to some bad things, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a single girl sees someone placing his hand on her waist and feels distressed This may indicate exposure to things that do not agree with it. Interpretation of dreams of someone I know who enchants me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams of someone I know who enchants me in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a stranger flirting with me in a dream could be a sign of emotional emptiness, and God knows the unseen. If a single girl sees a stranger flirting with her, this may lead to emotional emptiness and sadness, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees a stranger, He caresses her, as this may be a sign of the sadness she is experiencing, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of dreams for my beloved, sleeping with me in a dream. Interpretation of a dream for my beloved, sleeping with me in a dream. Communicating with a lover could be a sign of marriage, and God knows best for you.

title: Interpretation of a dream about going to the hospital in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about running to the hospital in a dream If you want to know the dream interpretation of running to the hospital in a dream, this is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very anxious, but he wants to know an explanation for it. That is why we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, and they are the interpretations of some diligent scholars, not those on the site. They do not enter into the interpretations, but rather they convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream about going to the hospital in a dream. Seeing running in the hospital in a dream may be getting rid of the fears that the dreamer was facing in the dream. Life at that time. If someone saw in a dream that he was running in the hospital, it is possible that the dreamer will suffer from some crises and get rid of them, thank God. In the event that a person saw that he was running inside the hospital, this may indicate a major problem that is occurring. In which the dreamer has the vision and needs to seek God’s help to get rid of it. To see yourself running in the hospital in a dream may mean that it may be a sign of changes occurring in the dreamer’s life during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of running after sheep in a dream in the event that he sees If one was running after sheep, this may indicate the large number of assets that the dreamer will acquire in those days. Seeing him running after sheep in a dream may indicate the large sums of money that the dreamer will obtain during this period, and God knows best. Seeing a person may indicate To run after sheep to a high and pioneering position that the dreamer would have reached in those days. Seeing him running after sheep in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of the dreamer’s desires and dreams at that period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in the snow in a dream: Seeing a person may indicate that he was running In the snow in a dream. It can indicate a lot of money that the dreamer gets in his life during this time. The person who saw that he was running in the snow in a dream can indicate the difficulties that the dreamer may face in his life at that time. In case one saw that he was running in the snow Snow, this may indicate that he made a lot of effort to reach the dreams and aspirations of those days, thanks to God. To see yourself running in the snow in a dream can mean peace and getting rid of the crises that the visionary was facing in his family life, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of running To the market in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he was running in the market may indicate the abundance of livelihood that the dreamer will receive in those days. In the event that one saw that he was running in the market, this may indicate the broad diet and high positions that the dreamer acquired during these days. Period. If someone saw that he was running in the market, this may indicate the fatigue and unhappiness that the dreamer is experiencing during those days. Seeing running in the market in a dream can also indicate the big changes that occur in the dreamer during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about running in a torrent in a dream: If one saw that he was running in a torrent

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing raisins in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Seeing raisins in a dream for a woman and a man explains many of the places that Imam Ibn Sirin explained in many of his interpretations. It is also believed that eating a woman carrying raisins in a dream is good luck and a blessing in money and a boy, and perhaps the woman portends a good seed for morals and religion, and buying raisins is an approach to the birth and safety of the fetus, perhaps distributing raisins in a dream is good news about a close marriage for a single woman and the ability to overcome Adversity, overcoming difficult responsibilities, achieving a high position in reality, and in this article you have everything related to seeing raisins in a dream. In detail.Interpretation of seeing raisins by Ibn Sirin. The interpretation of dreaming of seeing raisins in a dream by the researcher Ibn Sirin said that it indicates kindness and obtaining a living. Seeing picking raisins from the ground in a dream is a glimpse of the inheritance that is receiving the inheritance. Distributing raisins in a dream is one of the desired visions that show love. Big for the dreamer. Seeing raisins in a dream is an indication of a trip or project and a sign of an important step in the dreamer’s life. A young man who sees himself in a dream indicates that he is distributing raisins to people for early marriage. Interpretation of a dream about seeing raisins for a single woman. Interpretation of seeing raisins in a girl’s dream indicates Fulfillment of desires and dreams. The interpretation of seeing raisins in large quantities indicates that they received an amount of money from an old job or from a job that brought a lot of money. The interpretation of seeing raisins indicates the marriage of a handsome, well-mannered young man. The interpretation of a dream about giving raisins to a friend or relative indicates strong social ties And family ties. Interpretation of a dream about seeing raisins for a married woman. If a married woman sees raisins in large quantities or a box of raisins, this indicates the end of marital quarrels, the disappearance of sorrows and fears, and the improvement of living conditions. Giving raisins to the husband indicates marital happiness and the extent of love and understanding that unites them. Picking Raisins or a harvester indicates a blessing in money and a boy. If he sees that he is distributing raisins to family, friends and neighbors, this indicates that he has intelligence, logic, wisdom, family ties and successful social relationships. Drinking currant juice indicates calm, stability and peace of mind and can indicate recovery from diseases Dangerous. A gift of raisins to her husband or a family member shows that this is a good relationship. Interpretation of a dream about seeing raisins for a divorced woman. Seeing raisins in a dream means peace of mind and an end to sorrows. Seeing raisins in large quantities indicates financial stability and may indicate a prestigious job. Seeing raisins and dates as if they are eating together It is an indication of the disappearance of anxiety, stress, and happiness. Interpretation of a dream about seeing raisins for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she is eating raisins, this indicates that she is in good health and that her fetus is in good health. If it turns out that she is distributing raisins to the family and neighbors, this indicates an easy birth. Seeing her drinking juice Raisins indicate marital happiness and happiness after that with her child. Eating raisins in a dream Imam Al-Sadiq indicated that seeing raisins in a dream is a sign of...

title: The 150 most important interpretations of seeing a woman in a dream by Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Sirin

preview.html: The meanings of seeing a woman in a dream, according to Ibn Sirin and senior scholars: Sometimes a husband sees his wife in a dream performing different behaviors. He can see her laughing, crying, or screaming. All of these cases will be known in detail through the specialized Egyptian website, and we will explain to you the most important things that Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of a woman’s vision in Dream Follow the article below. Seeing a woman in a dream If the wife appears in a dream laughing to the point of laughter, then the scene contains bad connotations, she will be sad or become very ill, and sometimes laughing in a dream indicates to the wife her discomfort in her marriage and her feeling of humiliation and despair. Seeing a woman dancing in a dream indicates illness or serious family crises, and she may grieve for one of her children when she falls ill. Seeing a wife singing in a dream with a sweet voice, she may be happy in her life and hear happy news, but if she sings with a bad voice, she may receive painful news. About her family or her family in general. If the wife prays in a dream, the dream is good provided that she prays the obligatory prayer in modest clothing. When her husband sees that she is doing household chores in a dream, this dream reflects what the wife is doing in reality in terms of her service to her husband and children. If the wife sees herself She washes her children’s clothes, the vision means that she will help them in their lives with her advice and religious upbringing for them. If the wife is seen in new clothes in the dream, these are either pleasant events or the arrival of a new child for her. If the husband buys jewelry for his wife in a dream and sees her wearing it, this is affection and love between them on condition Do not these jewelry rust or break. If the wife is seen wearing gold, she may give birth to a boy, and if she wears two gold rings, this is a sign of the arrival of twins. If the wife is seen wearing silver rings or necklaces, she may give birth to a girl, and if the husband sees his wife taking silver jewelry from the Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. May God bless him and grant him peace. He interprets the dream as being close to God. And her attention to the Sunnah of our Prophet because she will be blessed with sustenance that is unparalleled in reality. If the wife sees her in a violent quarrel with someone, then a dispute may occur between them. Be alert after a violent quarrel with the same person. If the husband sees his wife eating food from her deceased mother, this is a provision that will come to him. And to her at the same time, and in both cases, God will cover them with His great cover. Seeing a woman screaming in a dream means misfortunes and sorrows that will come to her soon, but if she is distressed because of her daughter’s marriage or the arrival of happy news to her, it will make her scream happily. If she sees a wife in a dream She suffers from the bite of a snake or scorpion, then this is a fierce enemy that she will be able to do, but if she kills him, she will take revenge on her rivals or get rid of them. Forever. Seeing a wife drowning in a dream is a metaphor for her many sins or increasing pressures in her life in domestic, professional, material, and other responsibilities. If a husband sees his wife making bread in a dream, this is a happy life that will bring them together for many years. If a wife is burned in a dream, the scene is bad, either. If a small part of her body was burned and A was removed

title: Interpretation of seeing the number 140 in a dream

preview.html: Among these numbers, the number 140 indicates the great kindness and beauty that distinguishes the girl, and in the following lines we followed the interpretation of the number 140 in detail from gptafser.com/.Interpretation of seeing the number 140 in a dream for a single girl. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream any number with the number 140, this indicates To the correct choice of topics. When an unmarried girl sees the number 140 in her dream, this indicates the kindness and provision that she will receive. If an unmarried girl sees the number 140 in her dream, she is gradually starting to change. Such a vision indicates that in her life there will be people They are very close to her. They will suddenly change and move away from her as if she was not there. When a single woman sees the number 140 in her dream, she feels depressed and sad. This indicates the problems she is suffering from in her life and that she wants to change her reality. But if an unmarried girl sees the number 140 in her dream and her age of marriage. This dream shows that he loves someone in reality and wants to propose to her from her family. If an unmarried girl sees the number 140 in her dream, then it starts to fade, disappear, and she is happy with it. The vision indicates that this girl has problems In her life and it will disappear and disappear soon. If an unmarried woman sees that she is writing the number 140 and screams out of her sadness. It indicates the better reality that awaits her and the beautiful life. When a single girl sees the number 140 in a dream and tries to erase this number. The dream shows that this girl is doing everything In her power to change her life and do the impossible to gain her comfort. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing the number 21 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 140 in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the number 140 in a dream, her relationship with her husband is very compatible. This dream shows that this woman does everything Whatever she can to keep her relationship with her husband happy and stay away from all problems. When a married woman dreams that her husband gave her a wedding gift worth 140. It can show that her husband loves her very much and always strives to please her. On the other hand, if a married woman sees 140 in cash in her dream, she She goes shopping. It can symbolize that she meets all her family’s needs and runs the house in order. If a married woman dreams that someone she does not know attacked her and wanted to steal money worth 140. This dream shows that this woman is struggling a lot in her life and is struggling for the continuation of her family. Interpretation of seeing the number 140 in a dream about a man and its meaningIf a man sees the number 140 in his dream and he intends to do something for a living. It can indicate that he will secure everything he needs and achieve everything he plans, and he is actually a mind and a conservative person. When a man sees the number 140 in In his dream, his relationship with his children and wife was good and friendship dominated them. This indicates that this man is satisfied with my family and that he is an ideal father and a wonderful husband. Either if someone sees the number 140 in his dream and he has a problem at work. This dream indicates that this man will think many times about Ending his work problems and returning to his normal work. Who saw

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about a dog biting my hand according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dog biting my hand: A dream about a dog biting my hand is one of the dreams that causes us panic. In fact, this bite requires long treatment and exposes the person to serious danger, especially if the dog is wild or injured. From an infectious disease, but what does this dream mean if we see it in a dream? We will know this in detail now. What is the interpretation of a dream when a dog bites my hand? Commentators said that the first thing that comes to his mind when he sees this dream is to review himself well and think about what his hands did to be bitten in the dream, and this is the correct thought on which many of them relied on the interpretation This dream. Some scholars said that if the fortuneteller works in trade, he is more knowledgeable about the tools and methods that he uses to grow his money and expand his trade, and whether he follows the correct methods that make him an honest trader or not. And if he is dishonest, then his dream is a warning and a warning to continue this. The path, and to return to the path of truth and guidance, and make his food good so that God will please him and bless him with what he has. While Imam Al-Sadiq had another opinion on this dream, he said that if the dreamer is a person close to God and does not commit sins, then this will punish him severely, but it could He becomes infected with a certain disease, for example. Then he is patient, considers it, and prays to God Almighty to lift this sadness from him. The young man saw this dream, and his attention was distracted, and he did not devote himself to what God commanded him to do, and he wasted his money and time on useless things. As for the married man who sees this dream in a dream, he must stop. Take a moment with himself and look at his past or his relationship with his wife and how things are going, and if he treats her in a way that pleases God or slanders her and oppresses her, and he may insult and beat her. If that is the case, let him step back and think carefully about the heavy commandment that he received from her guardian on the day he proposed to her, and also remember How did our honorable Messenger treat his wives and learn from him? What is the interpretation of a dream about a dog biting my hand according to Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin said that a pet dog that bites his hand may represent the dreamer’s kindness or charity, but to the one who deserves it, so his reward was only the denial of that person to whom charity is given, but May God reward him. Waiting for him in the afterlife is enough for him, and he does not regret the good he has done, and it is better for him to put goodness in his family after that, as they are more deserving and better. He also said: If the dreamer is wrong or guilty, then he must hasten to repent for his sin and not surrender to his desires and whims; Because discipline is the most important thing to pay attention to. There is a possibility that there is a person close to the deity who believes in his sincerity, and he holds hatred and resentment towards him, and may come to organize plans to involve him in great trouble out of his hatred for him and a desire to ruin his life. Ibn Sirin said: The dreamer should beware of the people closest to him, and not neglect caution. What is the interpretation of a dream about a dog biting my hand for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about a dog biting my hand: A girl may feel anxious about entering into a new romantic relationship and sees that it is likely to fail, and this means that she does not have the ability to enter into it. Commentators believe that she is right to feel this way.

title: Interpretation of a dream about incest in a dream about a pregnant woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of incest in a pregnant woman's dream indicates the safe birth of a newborn and other interpretations such as a dream of incest, or a brother having sex with his sister, or my brother having sex with me, or a sleeping father, or I dreamed that I had sex with my brother, or I dreamed that my uncle had sex with me, or intercourse with my uncle or his brother-in-law, or with a brother, my husband for Ibn Sirin and others. Continuation of the topic: Interpretation of incest in a dream for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees that she is having sex with one of her relatives, this is evidence that the expected child will have the characteristics of the person you saw having sex with you in the dream. And the vision of intercourse with incest in a dream If she is beautiful in shape, the vision also indicates the birth of a beautiful child. As for intercourse with incest in a pregnant woman's dream, and that person was black or ugly, this means that she will suffer from an illness or there will be fatigue in her life or that her child will suffer from a serious illness after birth. And if the pregnant woman sees that one of her relatives is trying to molest her, this indicates deep sadness or a marital dispute that causes her sadness and creates problems in living with Her husband. Seeing an incestuous person, such as a brother, father, or uncle having sex with a pregnant woman, indicates the separation of a close person and that he will grieve over him. The vision also indicates that the dreamer will be deceived and betrayed by someone he loves. Seeing incest in a pregnant woman's dream means revealing secrets and receiving false accusations. As for if the blood comes from the anus in the dream, this means for the pregnant woman that she will be exposed to an accident and her genitals will be exposed to people. The vision also shows that her secret will be exposed to others, and the meaning of the dream may be that she will tell her many lies in the coming period. If the owner of the dream is pregnant and sees that a family member did it to her from the yard of her house, this indicates that she will face problems on her birthday or that she will be unhappiness in her married life. After giving birth or that she will get sick on the day of birth. And if the pregnant woman sees that someone is incestuous with her, she will give birth to a cruel boy if the man is white. As for incest in the dream of a pregnant woman, and the man is black, this indicates the birth of a girl who does not adhere to religion. But if the pregnant woman sees that intercourse does not satisfy her, the dream indicates the difficulty of childbirth, the opposite, if the pregnant woman sees that she loves incest in the vision or that she enjoys the vision, which indicates the ease of that. Childbirth and the safety of the fetus and its good health. Seeing a pregnant woman in contact with a family member in a dream indicates marital happiness and stability of life. And seeing incest in a pregnant woman's dream with a beloved family member indicates the imminent date of birth. But if incest was with a family member, but he did not like it, the vision indicates the livelihood that she and her husband will obtain, and this may be in work or improving the financial situation of the owner of the dream. As for seeing incest but from the anus, this vision shows that you are a person who tolerates prohibitions in your life

preview.html: It is easy to learn how to control your dreamsImaginations that come from your subconscious mindWhile sleeping through these imaginations, dreams will be controlled. These dreams are usually done by distraction and suggestion. Dreams that occur randomly are often the worst of separate and suggestive dreams. There are certain commitments that are necessary for a person to gain the ability to control his dreams. Read also: Toilet in a dreamThe ability to know how to control your dreamsInterpretation scholars have confirmed that a person's dreams are sometimes frightening, which makes it necessary for him to try to discover ways to control his dreams and for this reason:The role of dreams The person's mind must present him to a world that resembles reality for the dreamer who has a dream or vision. The science of dream control is not limited to a science that goes beyond nature, many experiments have been conducted on many people as well. Your subconscious mind, while you sleep, collects all the familiar things that you do in your normal moments, and then you dream them again. How to record your dreams so that you can control themIt is possible to buy a blog to record your dreams that you want to come true in the future and then keep it and after you wake up write down every dream you have dreamed. It is possible to use your computer to write your dreams, but it is preferable to write by hand: Recording dreams Every night you must write the dream you want to dream, taking into account the development of all the details. All you do in your trick and trick is to write the dream you want to dream in your subconscious mind and you have to watch TV before you go to sleep. Write down dreams as soon as you wake up. Learn how to control your dreams You need to make dream traps and practice them so that you can see the dream clearly while you are sleeping. Your subconscious mind responds to all instructions that reach the clairvoyant's mind and you can write the difference between the dream you want to dream and the dream you dreamed. To control your dream while you are sleeping The results of the tested studies confirmed that people control their dreams without anything happening to them and this was as follows: Experiments were conducted on people who were tested to experience reality and their environment several times a day. The dreamer is tested in his disturbed sleep and faces the idea that everything he sees is a vision and not reality. The authors of the study confirmed that dreamers must imagine entering lucid dreams. The experiments were conducted for a period of no less than seven days, and the result was the success of the experiment by entering lucid dreams and applying this method The dreamer can enter his stage of lucid sleep through a method invented by the inventor Stephen LaBerge, where you can send a signal to the dreamer to enter the dream at maximum speed using the movement of his eyes during sleep: There are two electric rods connected to the dreamer's eye openings, and through them the previous movement is obtained. This method participated in the work of many successful experiments in which the researcher and the dreamer agreed to describe the characteristics of the dream world and know how to control people's brains. title: What is the interpretation of seeing the full name Rayyan in a dream?

preview.html: The Trend website provides you with an interpretation of seeing Ryan's full name in a dream. We provide you, dear followers, with all the specific meanings and evidence for the name Rayyan in a dream, complete from the books of leading scholars of interpretation and visions. We have also collected for you the complete interpretation of the name Rayyan in a dream for pregnant women, married women, the elderly and men. Seeing the full name Rayyan in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says that the name Rayyan in a dream indicates goodness and the completion of life in the dream and good deeds. Also, this vision in a dream may It indicates the collapse of the dreamer’s problems and fears that the dreamer often faces due to the pressure of work or work, and God knows best. Al-Rayyan is one of the gates of Paradise that those who fast enter, and this vision indicates that the believers will solve their problems. The meaning of the name Rayan in a dream is complete for a common woman, if an unmarried girl sees the name Rayan in her dream, or that she will marry a man named Rayan, this indicates her good circumstances, and God knows best. Also, seeing the name Al-Rayyan or Bab Al-Rayyan for a girl of A’a indicates her closeness to the person she loves and a lot of sustenance. Also, seeing a girl praying at Bab Al-Rayyan in a dream Full indicates her superiority in life and study and shows that she has entered a job. As this vision indicates the ambitions and aspirations of the girl’s audience that she is trying to achieve in all different ways, and God knows best. Interpretation of the appearance of the full name Rayan in a dream for a married woman. If a married woman sees the full name Rayan in a dream, then this It means that the gates of Paradise will open for her and that her hopes and hopes will be fulfilled. Likewise, if a married woman sees in her food a child named Rayan, this indicates that she will soon become pregnant with a beautiful child who has a beautiful face and soul. Seeing the full name Rayan in a dream for a married woman indicates that her husband will join a job New in reality and achieves his future, works and increases his livelihood. Interpretation of the full name Rayyan in a dream for a married woman. If a pregnant woman sees the name Rayyan in her dream, this vision indicates the ease of carrying a healthy child free of all diseases. Likewise, if a pregnant woman sees Bab Al Rayyan in her dream, this means That her marital affairs will be facilitated without disputes and problems. The interpretation of seeing the full name Rayan in a dream for a pregnant woman is evidence that God has blessed her with a child free of all diseases. Seeing a pregnant woman named Rayan is a scenario, which means that God will bless her with a male child who will have a relationship in the world. The interpretation of the name Rayan in a dream is complete for a man. If a man sees in his dream that his name is Rayan, this indicates that the dreamer has deceived him. His closest relatives and friends, and God knows best. Likewise, seeing the full name of Al-Rayyan in a dream, which is the door to Paradise, indicates the ease of the dreamer’s life and the abundance of livelihood and money that he sees. title: What is the interpretation of a dream about shooting a person according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about shooting someone: Seeing shooting is one of the frightening visions that make the dreamer feel chills and fear in his sleep and make him search for its interpretation and its good or bad connotations, but the interpretation as a whole depends on the social status of the viewer and the extent of his relationship with those around him, whether they are good relationships or problematic relationships. Interpretation of a dream about shooting someone by Ibn SirinInterpretation of a dream about shooting someoneDreaming about shooting someone in a dream means that if the dreamer is sick, he will recover and his health and strength will return to him. But if one sees that he is in a gathering of unarmed people without weapons, and he is the only one who If he carries a weapon and shoots it, the dream indicates that he will obtain a prominent position. And if the dreamer sees that he is the one who shoots and beats a person, it means that he will be victorious in ending the dispute with that person and resolving the dispute on his behalf. This vision has another interpretation if the dreamer does not have enemies, then the interpretation of the dream is the dreamer’s high position among people and his good behavior. Interpretation of the dream of shooting a person by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin interprets the dream of shooting a person in a dream and not being hit by bullets, and that the dreamer is performing bad deeds. This vision is a warning to him. Among the interpretations of a dream about shooting is that the dreamer has many good opportunities in his life and is trying to take advantage of them to reach the best opportunities. Shooting the dreamer is like losing confidence in those around him, especially in his circle of relatives. Ibn Sirin confirms that when the man saw the shots, he was A traveler is about to return to his family safe and sound. From the interpretation of seeing one’s stomach wound in a dream, it indicates that the dreamer needs quick positive changes in his life. The dream interpretation section on the Egyptian website from Google, contains thousands of interpretations that you are looking for. Interpretation of a dream about launching Shooting one person: For a single woman to see in her dream that someone is shooting another person means that she is a person full of hatred around her and her friends do not like her. If she sees that she is in a place full of weapons, this indicates that the man who will marry her in the future will have forbidden, polygamous relationships and she will discover That is for herself. When she dreams of a weapons store, her family knows that she is a bad girl and that she is on the wrong path. If she sees someone shooting at her and sees herself bleeding profusely, this indicates that she will live a poor life because money was wasted in her life. But if the dreamer is sick and she sees In her dream that someone is shooting and did not hit her, this is a sign that she is about to recover from her illness. Interpretation of a dream about shooting a married woman. If a married woman dreams that someone is shooting at the other person, this means that there is something important in her married life and someone wants What to tell her. Seeing someone shooting her means that there are many enemies lurking around her and conspiring against her, and the message in the dream is clear that she should be careful of what is secretly happening around her. Seeing her shooting her husband shows that there are major problems between them and it may end. They have the mother
